p.span:
We are a school of choice for all grades K-12. A small school setting with a world class education.
Take a look at why LPS has earned national recognition year after year!

p.span: Leland Public School is an International Baccalaureate World school for kindergarten through 10th grade.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

br.span: Our K-12 school takes great pride in being a small, close-knit, caring and supportive community. We have high expectations for our student body in all curricular and co-curricular areas, and we have a strong reputation and track record as an outstanding educational institution.

div.p: Leland High School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Leland High Public Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
